actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to extend the Federal program of assistance for the developmentally disabled to include the physically disabled.

summary.text: Extends the Federal program of assistance for the developmentally disabled under the Mental Retardation Facilities and Community Mental Health Centers Construction Act of 1963 to include the physically disabled. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 2691)

titles.title: A bill to extend the Federal program of assistance for the developmentally disabled to include the physically disabled.
